rows.label: qst000601_msg0001
rows.name: Oh!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0002
rows.name:
Why, if it isn't a Driver! Just who I
was hoping to see.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, you see, I've got loads of fruit
now, thanks to this bumper harvest.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0004
rows.name:
I was just thinking I'd use it to make
my famous fruit pie. Everyone gets a
slice!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0005
rows.name:
I don't mean to brag, but everyone who
tries my pie says it's something special.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0006
rows.name:
Yes, ask anyone. Twaina's pie, the
tastiest in all of Trigo!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0007
rows.name:
My husband nearly bursts his breeches
stuffing himself when I make it.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0008
rows.name:
It was because of my pies that he
wanted to marry me, he said.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh, I'm sorry, I got a little bit carried
away blowing my own trumpet there.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0010
rows.name:
So the problem is, I'm actually
a bit short of some of the things
I need for my pie.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0011
rows.name:
The traders round here are hopeless
for ingredients, so I was hoping some
kind person would get them for me.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0012
rows.name: That's very kind of you.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0013
rows.name:
Could you get me a nice bit of
Hustle Hyacinth and some Mint Fish?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0014
rows.name:
It's just not the same without those
special ingredients.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0101
rows.name: Hello there. How are you?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0102
rows.name:
It's Hustle Hyacinth and Mint Fish
I'm after. Have you got it yet?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0103
rows.name:
Well, I'm sure you'll find some sooner
or later!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0201
rows.name:
Hello! Did you get those ingredients
yet?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0202
rows.name: Oh! Thank you so very much!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0203
rows.name:
Thanks to you I'll be able to make my
incredible pie!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0204
rows.name:
Well... I would be able to, if my stove
hadn't broken down.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0205
rows.name:
We've got this custom-made stove at
home, you see. It's a real devil to fix
when it breaks.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0206
rows.name: And it's always breaking down...

rows.label: qst000601_msg0207
rows.name:
My husband's usually the one who
sorts it out for me.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0208
rows.name:
It's one of those funny old machines
which needs a tender touch. It reminds
me of why I married him...

rows.label: qst000601_msg0209
rows.name:
Yes, actually, he's not just good with
stoves... One time, this really nasty
Bunnit came into town, and he...

rows.label: qst000601_msg0210
rows.name:
Oh, look at me, I'm getting carried
away chatting again.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0211
rows.name: Now what was I talking about...?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0212
rows.name:
Oh yes... Getting that funny old stove
fixed.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0213
rows.name:
My husband's out cutting wood, and I
don't know when he'll be back. So I'm
not sure how to get that stove fixed.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0214
rows.name:
You aren't any good at fixing stoves,
are you?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0215
rows.name: Ah! I've had a brainwave!

rows.label: qst000601_msg0216
rows.name:
Why don't you lot go and find the
craftsman who built our stove and bring
him here?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0217
rows.name:
His name's Glyn. You'll find
him at Trigo Market, I bet.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0218
rows.name:
I'm so sorry to keep asking you to do
me all these favors... But could you
go and get him for me?

rows.label: qst000601_msg0219
rows.name:
Oh, thank you so much! I'll give you
something really nice if you take care
of this...

rows.label: qst000601_msg0301
rows.name:
Glyn's over at Trigo Market, I
dare say.

rows.label: qst000601_msg0302
rows.name:
Thanks for doing it. I'm terrible with
all these requests, aren't I?
